name: sdp-transform
description: A simple parser/writer for the Session Description Protocol
author: Eirik Albrigtsen <sszynrae@gmail.com>

scripts.lint: eslint-config-prettier eslint.config.mjs && eslint -c eslint.config.mjs --max-warnings 0 eslint.config.mjs jest.config.mjs checker.mjs src && prettier --check README.md CHANGELOG.md eslint.config.mjs jest.config.mjs package.json tsconfig.json checker.mjs src
scripts.format: prettier --write README.md CHANGELOG.md eslint.config.mjs jest.config.mjs package.json tsconfig.json checker.mjs src
